notification.name: serviceUnresponsive
notification.text-message: The %service% poll to interface %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel%) on node %nodelabel% successfully completed a connection to the service listener on the remote machine. However, the synthetic transaction failed to complete within %parm[timeout]% milliseconds, over %parm[attempts]% attempts. This event will NOT impact service level agreements, but may be an indicator of other problems on that node.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %service% service on %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% is unresponsive.

notification.name: serviceResponsive
notification.text-message: The %service% service on %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% has recovered from a previously UNRESPONSIVE state. Synthetic transactions to this service are completing within the alotted timeout and retry period.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %service% service on %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% has recovered.

notification.name: interfaceDown
notification.text-message: All services are down on interface %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel%. New Outage records have been created and service level availability calculations will be impacted until this outage is resolved.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% down.

notification.name: nodeDown
notification.text-message: All services are down on node %nodelabel%. New Outage records have been created and service level availability calculations will be impacted until this outage is resolved.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: node %nodelabel% down.

notification.name: interfaceUp
notification.text-message: The interface %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% which was previously down is now up.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: Interface %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% has been cleared

notification.name: nodeUp
notification.text-message: The node %nodelabel% which was previously down is now up.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: Node %nodelabel% has been cleared.

notification.name: nodeLostService
notification.text-message: The %service% service poll on interface %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) i on node %nodelabel% failed at %time%.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %service% down on %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel%.

notification.name: nodeRegainedService
notification.text-message: %service% service restored on interface %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel%.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel%'s %service% service restored.

notification.name: coldStart
notification.text-message: An SNMP coldStart trap has been received from interface %snmphost%. This indicates that the box has been powered up.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %snmphost% powered up.

notification.name: warmStart
notification.text-message: An SNMP warmStart trap has been received from interface %snmphost%. This indicates that the box has been rebooted.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %snmphost% rebooted.

notification.name: authenticationFailure
notification.text-message: An Authentication Failure has been identified on network device %snmphost%. This message is usually generated by an authentication failure during a user login attempt or an SNMP request failed due to incorrect community string.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: [OpenNMS] Authentication Failure on %snmphost%.

notification.name: serviceDeleted
notification.text-message: Due to extended downtime, the %service% service on interface %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% has been deleted from OpenNMS's polling database.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel%'s %service% service deleted.

notification.name: nodeAdded
notification.text-message: OpenNMS has discovered a new node named %parm[nodelabel]%. Please be advised.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %parm[nodelabel]% discovered.

notification.name: nodeInfoChanged
notification.text-message: Node information has changed for a device in your network. The new information is included: System Name: %parm[nodesysname]% System Description: %parm[nodesysdescription]% System Object Identifier: %parm[nodesysobjectid]% System Location: %parm[nodesyslocation]% System Contact: %parm[nodesyscontact]% NetBIOS Name: %parm[nodenetbiosname]%
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: Node information changed.

notification.name: interfaceDeleted
notification.text-message: Due to extended downtime, the interface %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% has been deleted from OpenNMS's polling database.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: [OpenNMS] %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% deleted.
